name: Mic's Yorkshire Puds
instructions: Put the flour and some seasoning into a large bowl. Stir in eggs, one at a time. Whisk in milk until you have a smooth batter. Chill in the fridge for at least 30 minutes. Heat oven to 220C/gas mark 7. Pour the oil into the holes of a 8-hole muffin tin. Heat tin in the oven for 5 minutes. Ladle the batter mix into the tin. Bake for 30 minutes until well browned and risen.

name: Oatmeal Cookies
instructions: Simmer raisins and water over medium heat until raisins are plump, about 15 minutes. Drain raisins, reserving the liquid. Add enough water to reserved liquid to measure 1/2 cup. Heat oven to 400Â°. Mix thoroughly shortening, sugar, eggs and vanilla. Stir in reserved liquid. Blend in remaining ingredients. Drop dough by rounded teaspoonfuls about 2 inches apart onto ungreased baking sheet. Bake 8 to 10 minutes or until light brown. About 6 1/2 dozen cookies.

name: Big Night Pizza
instructions: Add hot water to yeast in a large bowl and let sit for 15 minutes.Mix in oil, sugar, salt, and flour and let sit for 1 hour.Knead the dough and spread onto a pan.Spread pizza sauce and sprinkle cheese.Add any optional toppings as you wish.Bake at 400 deg Fahrenheit for 15 minutes.Enjoy!
